title: DJI Mavic Air 2S review: new sensor makes all the difference
description: Despite being less than a year old, DJI is updating its popular Mavic Air 2 drone and is releasing the Mavic Air 2S. A drone with a new 1-inch sensor capable of shooting 5.4K video and 4K video up to 60FPS.
